column2: The fact that you didn't know who I was on first sight perplexed me.
I wanted you to listen to me as a normal person, disregarding the formalities of royalty
...Why haven't you called for your guards?
If you know that I'm with Sal, you must also know that I can and will kill you if necessary.
I could tell from the energy you give off that you truly want peace.
I don't know what to believe...
